review.body:
Does it mean that the code is not compatible with upstream openssl at the moment (circleci seems to get openssl from upstream)?

Looks good to me, only minor points below.

pull_request.title: memory leak fixes and fetchable sig enablement
pull_request.body:
This corrects some memory leaks detected by `valgrind` and adds logic to support #9. 

Until https://github.com/openssl/openssl/issues/10512 is fully resolved upstream, the new logic can be exercized by running the openssl version in https://github.com/baentsch/openssl/tree/sigload.
